sentence: Pennsylvanias GOP gubernatorial primary Pennsylvania Republicans appeared poised to nominate state Sen. Doug Mastriano on Tuesday to take on Democrat Josh Shapiro in the November general election, stirring concern among some GOP officials who fear that Mastriano may prove unelectable.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Seven primary races to watch on Tuesday

sentence: But Trump was undaunted by such fears, saying in a statement endorsing Mastriano, There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano.
author: Ken Bredemeier
title: Trumps Republican Political Clout Faces Another Test on Tuesday

sentence: Pennsylvania Gubernatorial Primary In a highly divisive race, Trump gave an 11th hour endorsement to Doug Mastriano, a far-right candidate who was part of the January 6 "stop the steal" protests and had attempted to overturn the 2020 Election results.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Trump Endorsements Face Toughest Test Yet in 27 Primary Election Battles

sentence: And in Pennsylvanias GOP race for governor, far-right contender Doug Mastriano was already leading before Trump backed him over the weekend.
author: WILL WEISSERT
title: Primary voters head to polls in Pennsylvania, North Carolina and 3 other states: Heres what to watch

sentence: In Pennsylvania, state Sen. Doug Mastriano, a Trump-endorsed candidate who led an effort to overturn the election in his state and attended the Stop the Steal rally on Jan. 6, 2021, the day a pro-Trump mob attacked U.S. Capitol, won the Republican nomination for governor.
author: David Weigel
title: Victories by Mastriano, Budd show potency of Trumps false stolen election claims in GOP

sentence: A victory in Pennsylvania, and one key race was too close to call Doug Mastriano, a state senator and retired Army colonel who has propagated myriad false claims about the 2020 election and attended the protest leading up to the Capitol riot, won the Republican nomination for Pennsylvania governor.
title: Heres where Trumps endorsement record stands so far.

author: Khaleda Rahman
title: How Donald Trump's Candidates Fared in Latest Primary Elections

sentence: Leading the Republican primary is state Sen. Doug Mastriano, whose efforts to overturn the 2020 election in favor of Trump and ties to QAnon have raised concerns both in and outside the party.
author: David Jackson
title: Fetterman wins Pennsylvania Democratic Senate primary; NC polls close; live primary results

sentence: In a last-minute endorsement that rattled members of Pennsylvanias Republican party, Trump backed Mastriano, a leading force in trying to overturn the 2020 election results who was pictured outside the Capitol on Jan. 6. There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano,? Trump said last week.
title: How Trump-backed candidates fared on the busiest primary day

sentence: Some pointed to Budd and Doug Mastriano, the newly minted GOP Pennsylvania gubernatorial nominee, as two who, while benefiting from Trumps endorsement, could have won their primaries without it.
author: Julia Manchester
title: Primaries fuel questions about potency of Trump endorsements

sentence: State Sen. Doug Mastriano who secured a late endorsement from Trump and has trumpeted the former presidents lies about nonexistent, widespread fraud costing him the 2020 election won the Republican nomination for Pennsylvanias open governors office.
author: WILL WEISSERT
title: Pennsylvania Lt. Gov. John Fetterman, who suffered a stroke days before primary, wins Democratic nomination for US Senate

sentence: In the gubernatorial election, President Trumps endorsement propelled conservative State Sen. Doug Mastriano to victory.
author: David N. Bossie
title: Pennsylvania proves Republicans still want 'America First'

sentence: Last night, Pennsylvania Republicans nominated a Big Lie proponent and January 6th "Stop the Steal" attendee named Doug Mastriano to run for governor of Pennsylvania in November.
author: Heather Digby Parton
title: 2022 GOP primaries prove that MAGA is now bigger than Donald Trump

sentence: Trump was a winner in Pennsylvanias GOP gubernatorial primary, as state Sen. Doug Mastriano bested a crowded field of contenders.
title: Trump-backed Dr. Oz and Dave McCormick go into overtime in Pennsylvanias crucial GOP Senate primary

sentence: They'll join Trump-backed gubernatorial candidate Doug Mastriano, a state senator who attended the Jan. 6 rally ahead of the Capitol riot and served as a phony Trump elector in an effort to overturn his loss.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Cawthorns loss highlights Trumps waning influence but election deniers win big in GOP primaries

sentence: Trump is poised to notch several easy wins, including in Pennsylvania's much-watched GOP race for governor, which far-right contender Doug Mastriano was already leading before the former president backed him over the weekend.
author: WILL WEISSERT
title: Election 2022: Budd, Beasley to face off for N.C. Senate

sentence: His pick for governor, state Sen. Doug Mastriano, won the nomination.
title: With a key race too close to call, here are 4 takeaways from Tuesday's primaries

sentence: Republicans are in full-scale panic about Doug Mastriano, the right-wing extremist who won the GOP primary for Pennsylvania governor this week.
author: Greg Sargent
title: Opinion Trumps alarming GOP primary wins demand a serious response

sentence: As the partys nominee for governor, GOP voters chose Trumps preferred pick, a state senator named Doug Mastriano who trumpets the big lie? about the 2020 election being stolen; was present at the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021 (though he says he left before the insurrectionary portion of the events); and appeared at an event associated with the hallucinatory QAnon conspiracy theory about the nation somehow being run by a cabal of pedophiles.
author: Eugene Robinson
title: Opinion Cult or a conspiracy? The GOP sure isnt a normal political party.

sentence: The Republican nominee for governor in Pennsylvania, Doug Mastriano, won his race on the strength of his enthusiastic support for Donald Trumps effort to subvert and overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election.
title: Its Trumps Party, and Hell Lie if He Wants To

sentence: In the gubernatorial primary, the Trump-backed far-right candidate Doug Mastriano was able to drub his opponents and win 44% of the vote in a 3-way race, even in the face of staunch opposition from the Republican establishment.
author: Douglas Schoen
title: Schoen: It's still Donald Trump's Republican party

sentence: Now, again, that's going to be a couple days here, but they'll be done this coming week is my suspicion. Doug Mastriano secured the Republican gubernatorial nomination in Pennsylvania following a late endorsement from former President Donald J. Trump over the weekend.
author: Nick Gilbertson
title: Trump-Endorsed Candidates 81-3 in Primaries Ahead of Races in Alabama, Arkansas, Georgia
